question: What is the primary purpose for your investment decision ?

choices.text: Safety First - I want to preserve Capital
Regular Income with regular positive return
Regular Income and marginal capital appreciation
My sole objective is maximum growth

question: The value of investments can decline in the market downturn. How much your investment could fall before you feel very uncomfortable.
When making an investment, I plan to keep the money invested for?
If you owned an investment that fell by 30% over a period of 3 months, what would you do?

choices.text: Sell all of the remaining investment.
Sell the portion of the remaining investment.
Hold onto the investment and sell nothing.

question: When it comes to an investment in stocks, bonds or mutual funds, I would describe myself as
Approximately what portion of your monthly net income goes towards saving (after paying all expenses and loan if any)?
Would you need any loan to meet your life goals?
